document_data.name: Elephant drum
document_data.mainbody: The '''elephant drum''' was a large instrument that originated in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.{{Cite dragon/190/Sounds of Wonder & Delight}}
document_data.Description: Elephant drums resembled ''[[darbukkah]]s'' but measured up to 6 feet in height. These large [[drum]]s were mounted on either side of an [[elephant]], hence their name. A rider would strike the drums with large mallets to produce a deep tone.
document_data.History: The elephant drums were most famous because of their use during parades by the [[Mad Caliph]] of [[Afyal]].
